name: Hotel de la Coupole - MGallery
address: 1,Hoang Lien Street, Sapa District, Lao Cai Province, 33000 Sa Pa, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở thị trấn Sa Pa, Hotel de la Coupole - MGallery có hồ bơi nước nóng trong nhà, spa và trung tâm thể dục.

Lấy cảm hứng từ các dân tộc thiểu số ở Sapa và thời trang May Đo Cao Cấp (Haute Couture) của Pháp, tất cả các phòng tại đây đều có ban công, máy điều hòa, truyền hình vệ tinh màn hình phẳng, ấm đun nước, bể sục, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, tủ quần áo, phòng tắm riêng và khu vực ghế ngồi. Một số phòng cho tầm nhìn ra khu vườn.

Khách sạn phục vụ bữa sáng tự chọn hoặc kiểu lục địa. Trong khuôn viên có nhà hàng Pháp Chic mở cửa cả ngày và đồng thời phục vụ các món ăn địa phương của Việt Nam. Du khách có thể thưởng thức bánh ngọt và sô-cô-la Marou được chế tác công phu tại tiệm bánh Cacao hay rượu sâm panh, món tapas và cocktail pha thủ công ở quán Absinthe.

Chỗ nghỉ cũng có phòng xông hơi khô và phòng tắm hammam. Khách nghỉ tại Hotel de la Coupole - MGallery có thể tham gia các hoạt động trong và xung quanh thị trấn Sa Pa, như đi xe đạp.

Du khách có thể hỏi nhân viên lễ tân để biết cách đi lại và các hoạt động trong khu vực. Trạm tàu hỏa leo núi đưa khách đến cáp treo Fansipan nằm ngay bên ngoài chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn cách bến xe Sa Pa 600 m, Hồ Sa Pa chưa đầy 1 km, Quảng trường Trung tâm Sa Pa 4 phút đi bộ, Nhà thờ Đá Sa Pa 400 m và Núi Fansipan 14 km.

review.rating: Excellent hôtel, digne d’un 5 étoiles, le meilleur de Sapa.
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
La décoration magnifique avec des reliques anciennes Françaises. 
la gentillesse et la politesse des employés. 
La situation géographique. 
La piscine exceptionnelle et les terrasses de bars accessibles au 10ème et dernier étage. 
Le calme et l’odeur du parfum d’intérieur à la réception (secret jalousement gardé). 
Le meilleur hôtel de SAPA après avoir testé le Silk Path et le Pao’s pendant 4 nuits chacun, qui sont très largement derrière en terme de gamme hôtelière et d’infrastructures. 
Excellent restaurant nommé « Good morning View » en contre bas de la ville, environ 10 minutes à pied de l’hôtel.
review.comment_negative:
Le bruit de l’aspiration d’eau à la piscine. 
Le prix exorbitant du petit déjeuner 25€ par personne, c’est beaucoup trop.

review.comment_positive: Das Hotel liegt mitten in der Stadt - alles ist fußläufig erreichbar. Großartiger Service, Wünsche wurden sofort erfüllt. Concierge hatte gute Vorschläge, den Fansipan (3.143 m hohes Dach von Indochina) mit Zug (7 min) und Cable Car (längste Seilbahn der Welt) zu erreichen. Ebenso wurde mir eine Tour mit einer Einheimischen durch 2 Dörfer vorgeschlagen, was sehr beeindruckend war. Tolles Frühstück, französische und asiatische Küche, tolle Spa-Angebote, ...
review.comment_negative: Am zweiten Tag hat der Zimmerservice ein wenig nachgelassen und zB den benutzten Obstteller nicht weggeräumt. Aber sonst gibt es kaum "room for improvement".

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: My breath was taken away...what an exceptional hotel. From the moment you enter the foyer you're embraced with the scent of cinnamon in the air and greeted with friendly staff who seat who invite you to sit in their foyer palour with a delectable hot chocolate. If you dream of 5 star, this is it. The archeture, hand painted wall decals, art work from a French inspired romantic colonialism will sweep you away to another place of pure luxury. There is no ugly here..from the lifts to the bathrooms you're incapulated into a dreamy world of velvet, mirrors and black mahogany framed windows. The pool has to be seen to be believed, like some Hollywood set from an Esther Williams aquamusical with red chandeliers, bronze inspired statues and marble. All the while your floating in a dreamy land theres the lilting sound of classical music lulling you away from the hectic outside world!  I could say more and could write a book about this place!

review.comment_positive:
We loved our stay at la Couple, the hotel is stunning and the staff are more than helpful, Customer service at its best.
Our room was excellent, very comfortable  lots of space and beautifully decorated.
We made use of the indoor pool, which was fabulous we almost had it to ourselves.
Breakfast is excellent the best we had throughout our stay in Vietnam, freshly baked croissants made my morning, all the staff are very good in the dining area but a special shout-out to Pineapple so friendly and welcoming.
We went for drinks after dinner in the bar and they had a great 3 piece band playing, they were brilliant; the cherry on top of the cake!
review.comment_negative: We went for drinks on the terrace before dinner to take in the view and it was spoilt by lots of badly behaved children using the terrace like a playground, climbing all over the furniture, we could not relax. We stayed on a weekend so this may be why so many kids.

review.rating: A truly exceptional stay at Hotel de la Coupole!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: I recently had a pleasure of staying at Hotel de la coupole, and I confidently say that it was an extra ordinary experience from start to finish. From the moment I arrived, I was met with unparalleled hospitality and a level of attention to detail that truly set this hotel apart.  The culinary offerings at Hotel de la coupole were nothing short and exceptional.  Each meal was a delight for the senses, with the perfect balance of creativity and flavor.  Shout out to the Chef who went above and beyond by personally delivering and skillfully grilling our steaks right in front of us.
review.comment_negative: Just a suggestion.  Kindly add a mat to the shower area, because the floor is slippery when wet.  Thank you.

Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The ambiance in the dining restaurant, Chic was awesome. The variety and taste of the breakfast offered wasn't the best i have seen but not bad. Coffee and hot choc were great. Quality of ingredients used in general was good. 
Staff was helpful and courteous. 
Stepping into this hotel, you would feel as though you're transported to somewhere else in this world. Deco of hotel is superb. We were there in Dec and the smell of gingerbread greeted us as we made way to Cafe Cacao, located towards the side wing of the lobby entrance. 
The view from the top terrace was amazing. 
If you intend to head to Fansipan, make sure to secure the tickets with the hotel at least a day before arrival. Hotel offers vip tickets at the same price as normal but you have to reserve it before arrival.
review.comment_negative:
Pillows were too soft. 
Food and extras a bit pricey,  but you would expect that anyway.

review.comment_positive: ホテル全体がゴージャスで、どこをとってもインスタ映えします。ヨーロッパのホテルグループだけあって、ヨーロッパを感じさせる雰囲気です。朝食が素晴らしい。種類が多く、とても美味しかったです。朝食会場は広々として、インテリアが素晴らしい。朝食会場のバルコニーにカフェラテを持って行って、山並みを見ながら飲みました。優雅な気分です。ホテルのロケーションは最高です。同じ建物内にケーブルカーの駅があるし、教会は歩いて２分。

review.rating: Extremely good with some minor flaws
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is one of the most stunning hotels we have been to in Vietnam. The design elements are truly fascinating. The breakfast was fantastic and the swimming pool is also simply fabulous. 
You can really feel how it must have been in colonial times thanks to all the amazing design elements. It's a vibe! 

Moreover, we came early with the night train from Hanoi and we were allowed to check in at 10:30 already, which we really appreciated.
review.comment_negative:
The early check in and a room upgrade we got came with a demand to give a 5 star review on tripadvisor even before we actually checked in. They would have gotten 5 stars anyways but this fishing for compliments is not worthy of a place like this.

Also, I cannot recommend dinner in the restaurant - the food was good but prices are the same as good restaurants in western capitals and compared to them it could not deliver the same experience. I believe going out in town is a much better option. 
The bar looks great but drinks were a bit disappointing (especially with regards to pricing) and the lights are too bright to create a nice bar ambience.

review.comment_negative: Wasn't clear on Booking.com that breakfast was not included. Wifi was so slow (1Mbps) - even slower than some cafes in the area. No smart TV or at least screen cast.

When we arrived in 7:30 at morning, we started to make the payment, we ask her for going to room to put our luggage for refresh for just hours and then we will go , we was having a tour at 8:30 .
She told us she can’t all of this talk ,,,
Come in !!! Its just for guests care !!! So I can understand she have ordered, but at least you should think more about us , we came from 5 hours flight from japan , and after that Hanoi and then 7 hours bus !! Isn’t easy was !
And also she didn’t told us about if we can pay room including breakfast, that was a bad situation every time we was finishing they ask us for payment!!!!
I was visiting a lot of 5 stars from top of the top , we are bloggers and we really liked your hotel and i still give a good review but to be honest this 2 reasons disappointed us a lot , but to be fair and honest the hotel and the staff are amazing.

review.comment_positive: There are some places, like Prague in the Czech Republic, where everything is so carefully designed, so beautiful, so aesthetically pleasing, that you can walk around and look at things for hours because you can't get enough. That's how this hotel is. We got back from a day of sightseeing in Sapa and then decided to stroll through the hotel for a couple of hours to look at things. Beyond being a 5-star hotel, it is just a feast for the eyes. It's utterly beautiful. The pool, the cafe, the rooftop, the lobby, the rooms. Everything is uniquely beautiful.
review.comment_negative: The front entrance to such a marvelous hotel feels like it should be in a better place, like directly facing out onto the main square, but it seems this isn't possible because they share the building with another business that currently holds that position. Not sure.

review.comment_positive:
Staying at a hotel like this was a once in a lifetime opportunity for me. From the moment I arrived I was well taken care of and felt special. My room was super quiet as it faced the inner courtyard, and I had the best two nights sleep in my entire trip to Vietnam. The breakfast was next level, something for everyone 

The part of Sapa the hotel is in is great with lots of local restaurants and cafes to eat in. It's not as loud as the other end of the town.

The inner courtyard is lovely to walk around in and there are benches you can sit at to enjoy the serenity.
review.comment_negative: There's a bit of a steep hill to get to the street the hotel is on. Nothing they can do about this obviously, but something to be aware of if you have mobility challenges or are feeling unwell.

review.rating: Just perfect experience. Will need to come back in August/September when rice fields in Sapa are green!

review.comment_positive: Everything is just perfect! Such a great experience! Quality of service, amazing property, dining experience, spa services (thank you Mu) and location. Highly recommend!

review.rating: If your budget allows it, I would recommend that you stay here!
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The hotel made you feel as if you had gone back in time. The indoor pool was great, and the view on the 10th floor was so beautiful.  I have to compliment the staff.  They are very helpful, and it was a shame that I did not remember their names.  One great thing about this hotel is that if you arrive very early in the morning by train and you need to wait till 2 p.m. to check in or after check-out while waiting for your night train, you can use the toilets in the pool area to bathe and freshen up.  That is definitely a plus.
review.comment_negative: The water pressure was not great at all, and the air conditioner is not working.  We complained about the air conditioning, and both times they claimed that it was fixed, but it did not get better.  We ended up opening the balcony door to keep the cool air in.

review.rating: Gorgeous hotel in a fantastic location.

review.comment_positive:
The building is beautiful with lots of attention to detail in the decor. Staff are friendly and helpful.

They have connecting rooms, which is useful for families. My room was on a lower floor, which had a  street view. 

Breakfast is served at the top of the building.so all hotel guests get the benefit of a high vantage point to view Sa Pa town and the mountains. The breakfast spread was extensive. 

The location is a great start point for exploring Sa Pa as it is in the town centre. The funicular and cable car rides to Fangsipan start from this building.

review.comment_positive:
소피텔 예하 부대라 그런지 깔끔하였고 독특한 프랑스풍 컨셉만큼은 확실히 사진 찍기 멋진 배경을 제공하긴 함.
직원들이 눈 마주칠때 마다 인사를 해주는데 매우 친절한 느낌을 받았음.
review.comment_negative:
호텔이 오래된건지는 모르겠으나 약간 사용감이 많이 보였음.
맞은편에서 미친듯이 노래를 시끄럽게 틀어재끼는 루프탑이 있음. 대략 11시30분 정도까지 난리를 침.
다음날 아침에 일찍 일어나야 한다면 매우 불편함을 느낄수 있음.
프랑스풍 컨셉은 좋으나 침실에 놓여진 마네킹이나 방마다 차이는 있겠지만 침대 머리맡에 큰 여자 그림등은 약간의 기괴함이 느껴지며 케바케로 불편한 사람도 있을듯

 It would be great if there could be a shop opposite the hotel selling locally made handmade goods.

review.rating: Outstanding Customer Service and Attention to Detail
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
From the moment we walked through the doors, we were consistently impressed by the level of care and professionalism demonstrated by your staff.

First and foremost, the hotel's warm welcome made us feel right at home. The check-in process was efficient and friendly, and we were immediately made to feel like valued guests. Throughout our stay, every member of your staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction.

One of the standout aspects of our stay was the impeccable cleanliness and maintenance of the hotel. Our room was spotless, and the attention to detail in housekeeping was evident. It was clear that the staff took pride in their work and were committed to creating a comfortable and inviting atmosphere.

Moreover, we must commend your concierge and front desk teams, Mr Thang, in particular, for their exceptional assistance. They were always ready to provide recommendations for our needs, source SIM cards, arrange transportation, and ensure that we had everything we needed to make the most of our stay. Their dedication to ensuring that we had a seamless and enjoyable experience did not go unnoticed.

In conclusion, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for the outstanding customer service and attention to detail we experienced at your hotel. It is clear that your team is dedicated to providing a first-rate experience for your guests, and it made our stay truly memorable. It is with enthusiasm we recommend your hotel to friends and colleagues and look forward to returning in the future. Thank you for setting the bar so high for hospitality.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Even just for one night, you MUST stay in this hotel as part of your Sapa itinerary. It's a destination and attraction on its own. One of the most gorgeous hotels I've ever seen. Photo opps every corner. Luxurious ambiance, colonial feel. Don't miss the bar, the swimming pool (the most jaw-dropping!) and their mega breakfast, of course! On a clear day, the mountain views from the 10th floor (breakfast venue) are breathtaking.
The staff are very patient and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The room itself is nothing special (the bathroom is great, though, and I fell in love with their bathrobes). It's overpriced for what it is. But then, you basically pay for the hotel facilities and the overall experience. No regrets.

review.comment_positive: Honestly we have never got a chance to stay in a such beautiful hotel as the "Hotel De La Coupole". The staffs did surprise us by offering a beautiful wedding-like decorated room when learning that we came to Sapa to celebrate our 30th anniversary. Breakfast was so great with so many choices that made us awake early on the next day to enjoy their foods. review.rating: Un hôtel comme un décor de cinéma... et la plus belle piscine du monde !
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Un espace hors du temps au coeur de Sapa (ville de montagne, point de départ de randonnées à la découverte - notamment - du peuple Hmong ; proche de la frontière chinoise).
L'hôtel semble sorti d'un conte. Association de styles surprenante et réussie : Art déco, Rococo, ...
Personnel attentionné, à l'écoute, disponible. Petit déjeuner fastueux et... la plus belle piscine du monde ! (dans la catégorie "piscine d'hôtel").
review.comment_negative:
je cherche encore... 
Un conseil pour les amateurs de grand air : demandez une chambre avec vue sur la montagne car les "vue jardin" ont en réalité vue sur l'intérieur de l'hôtel (immense patio certes mais pas un jardin).

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Experience at Hotel De La Coupole was nothing short of exceptional. Nestled in chic decor, the ambiance exudes luxury and comfort. The bed provided an oasis of relaxation, offering a night of unparalleled comfort. The staff's warm demeanor and genuine hospitality added a personal touch to our stay, exemplified by their thoughtful gesture of surprising me with a birthday cake in the room. While breakfast came at an additional cost, it was undeniably worth every penny. From delectable delicacies to tantalizing treats, it was undoubtedly one of the finest breakfast spreads we've indulged in. Hotel De La Coupole effortlessly blends opulence with warmth, making it a memorable destination for any traveler seeking an unforgettable experience.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: We were given an upgrade on arrival, always a good start! The staff are exceptionally helpful and attentive. The hotel itself is beautifully presented with excellent amenities, and the rooms are well appointed. It is in a very good location. The breakfast is amazing and it is very easy to lose track of time in the Absinthe bar while you enjoy a cocktail or 7 and the spectacular views over the valley. We loved it so much, we stayed an extra night!
review.comment_negative: The only thing we didn't like was the fixed a/c temp in the rooms. We were unable to adjust this ourselves, however the staff happily reset the temp at our request.

review.comment_positive: This hotel is the most amazing place in my life! Good service from all staff, especially “James”, who is in charge of the front reception. Beautiful decorations and lovely smells at the lobby make me relax and happy when I entered the hotel. The swimming pool is also perfect place for relaxing and enjoying the time. Various kinds of foods are serviced during the breakfast! Here, Hotel De la Coupole, is the best hotel in my life!

review.rating: Erg luxe hotel met matig personeel
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Het ontbijt was erg luxe! Je kon echt alles krijgen, niks was te gek! Personeel in restaurant was super. 
Onze kamer was netjes. Grote bedden en heerlijk matras. Het zwembad is fantastisch en erg bijzonder qua architectuur.
Het hotel ligt erg praktisch. Vanuit hier neem je ook de kabelbaan naar de Fansipan.
review.comment_negative:
Personeel bij receptie was wisselend vriendelijk. Onze check in verliep minder soepel. Wij kwamen ‘s nachts aan en kregen, nadat we betaald hadden, het pasje in onze handen en mochten het verder uitzoeken. We wisten alleen dat onze kamer op de 7de verdieping lag. Het was dus even zoeken op welke gang. Daarnaast mochten we ook zelf onze tassen dragen. Wij kregen totaal geen hulp. Na een lange busrit en erg moe te zijn was wat meer hulp en uitleg prettig geweest. Dit is geen overbodige luxe voor dit soort hotels. 
Daarnaast vroegen we om wat bezienswaardigheden rondom Sa Pa. Ook hierin werden we slecht geholpen.

review.comment_negative:
The check-in experience was not good. We made a prepayment but didn't have that exact card with us when checking-in (as were travelling with travel cards / not credit cards). Management were inflexible to this policy & we weren't aware as would have otherwise used a different card on prepayment. Result was we had to pay again on a separate card - other card was refunded but payment won't arrive for 45-days! It's a painfully long time to be out of pocket $700+ & I would expect more support from a global international chain.

Further, being a luxury hotel, the food, drink and other costs are v. high. My recommendation is to get out on the town & use local suppliers re: laundry, drinks etc - otherwise you're paying significantly more than the average local price.

I asked them to show me the policy where it said that's how much you'd have to pay if you broke a wine glass. They didn't have a policy to show. After talking to the manager, he agreed to give me a 50% "discount", so I ended up paying usd8. Still a lot for Vietnam standards, where an entire meal in a nice restaurant costs usd8. Overall a good stay - just don't break any glasses. If you do, they'll charge you, and it'll be a lot.

review.rating: An excellent stay if you advocate for yourself
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The room in the grounds were beautifully decorated with very well stocked breakfast option in opulent settings. The pool was particularly cozy and decadent for a day of lounging when the weather was bad out. The funicular train to Sun world being in the same building was an unexpected bonus. Additionally, the vehicle rental place across the street is exceptionally convenient with great prices.
review.comment_negative:
One of the things that was disappointing was that the room, as pictured on bing.com includes the implication of a view of the mountains, however, the first room that we had looked out to allowed street and air conditioner level of dilapidated building. There wasn’t much done to hide this view from the room, and it made the entire experience seem cramped. We were moved to a separate room that smelled of cigarettes smoke. After that staff essentially told us that we were out of luck And should not have expected the pictures to match the room since the insides were exactly the same.  Given that we traveled 14,000 km from New York this was disappointing but the manager ultimately made it right by putting us in the room that best matched the advertising on the second night. 

The restaurant is very cute but some of the food is ambitious for what their kitchen is able to make. For example, the Georgian dish KachiPuri requires a very fluffy bread filled with cheese and egg. What was served was a fairy flat version of that that was over salted. When we ordered room service, it was heavy on the vegetables and light on the meat although the spring roll was fresh and well executed.

review.rating: Next level luxury overlooking Sapa town.
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The Hotel de la Coupole is a visual treat, everywhere you look there is a feast for the eyes with each and every detail considered. If it is a clear day, the views from the restaurant, bar and bridge are spectacular. The breakfast buffet was generous and featured everything we might have wanted and cocktails in the Absinthe bar were delicious.
We especially loved spending time in the large pool area. As well as being beautiful the pool was large, featured spa seating and was nicely heated. 
Our room was spacious and beautifully designed featuring a very large bed, armchair and beautiful toiletries.
A massive shout out to the staff who were friendly and attentive and those we didn't see behind the scenes who produced the delicious food and kept everything up and running and spotless.
While this hotel comes with a higher price tag than most I think it is worth it as a special treat
review.comment_negative: The only downside to our stay was the bedding . Our mattress felt flat, lumpy and hard. Perhaps the one in our room is ready to be replaced. Additionally, there are no options to the feather pillows for those that prefer a firmer pillow.

When I asked for our leftovers to be reheated they didn’t just microwave our food on a plate but presented everything very nicely. They plated all of our leftovers even though they weren’t leftovers from the hotel restaurants. 
The swimming pool was nice and the facilities were clean. My kids enjoyed the shallow splash area with the fountain.
review.comment_negative:
The food is terrible. It is just pretty cardboard. The only thing edible from the breakfast was the yogurt. I would not pay for food here again. 
There was mold in the bathroom and mildew in the grout. There should be a fan and a shower door to make the bathroom more pleasant. 
The rooms were a bit on the small side.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Aussergewöhnliches und imposantes Gebäude das bis ins kleinste Detail im Stiel der französischen Indochina Zeit der 20er Jahre aufgemacht ist. Das Personal ist äusserst aufmerksam und freundlich. Das Frühstücksbuffet lässt keine Wünsche offen. Die Lage ist sehr zentral. Nebst dem Hotel sind im Gebäude mehrere Läden und die Station der Fansipan Standseilbahn integriert.   
Tipp: Delux Zimmer in den oberen Stockwerken mit Bergsicht buchen. Die Aussicht auf die umliegenden Täler ist grandios.

review.rating: Erlebnisreich und wunderschön wie die Landschaft um Sa Pa
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Eine sehr gute Atmosphäre, freundliches Personal ein für mich herrliches Schwimmbad sauber und schön ein Still wie auch das ganze Hotel und die Zimmer der 1930 Jahre. Ich persönlich rate zu den Zimmern in grün… tolle Zimmer mit herrlichem Ausblick.Leider hatten wir mit dem ersten Zimmer ein kleines Problem was wir mit Frau Giang zu unserer vollsten Zufriedenheit lösen konnten , sie ist kompetent zuverlässige und sie hat wirklich Interesse das man sich Wohl fühlt. Die Massage im Wellnessbereich ist auch sehr zu Empfehlen. Und das Essen zum Frühstück ist außergewöhnliche üppig und lecker. Auch für Europäer .
review.comment_negative: In manchen Zimmern nach vorne, richt man den Grillrauch der Vietnamesischen Küche der Straße. Was auch sehr lecker und schmackhaft ist , und nicht jeden stört.

review.comment_positive: I was very pleased with the property. The staff were great and helpful. My bed was comfortable. I was hypnotized with the architect of the hotel.

review.comment_positive: The property was excellent in terms of the location and the decor. Chinh, the front desk staff was a gem. She is professional, courteous and hardworking.  The weather in Sapa was really bad and we really wanted to go on a walking tour to the villages. She went out of her way to help us coordinate our tour. She was kind enough to communicate with me via whatsapp so that we could keep track of the weather conditions and be able to book our tour when the weather got better. Thanks to her, we were able to visit the villages which was the highlight of our trip. Chinh is really an asset to the hotel!

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in the heart of Sapa.
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful hotel - the view from the bar area is simply amazing.
The staff was very polite and accommodating. 
The food is high quality - the breakfast buffet has a wide range of food (western and eastern) and the dinner was excellent.
Concierge was very helpful.
The hotel has a special entrance for the train to Fansipan - little bonus!😊
The pool is amazing after a morning "climbing" to Fansipan summit.
The room are good size room, the bed is very confortable and the bathroom well equipped. 
The decoration throughout the hotel is amazing.
Book a garden view as the street can be noisy.

Echt de moeite waard!
review.comment_negative:
Bij het uitchecken gingen 2 personeels leden heel druk rekenen met rekenmachine . Dit had betrekking op activiteit die ik dag ervoor had gedaan en betaald. Zonder iets te zeggen 5 minuten lang druk en opeens; we hebben een fout gisteren gemaakt je moet bij betalen. Zonder blikken of blozen. 
Personeel is formeel en vooral op de centen. Mis bepaalde betrokkenheid/ interesse. In bijvoorbeeld hoe je verblijf is geweest of wat het vervolg wordt (heeft u nog een taxi nodig?) . Bij andere hotels in Vietnam vond ik het personeel vriendelijker. Het heeft ons verblijf echter niet beïnvloed. Punt van aandacht denk ik wel.

Bên Booking để phía khách phải trả giá phòng cao hơn bình thường mà không có buffee sáng , xử lý chậm trễ . Minh đã ở khách sạn không phải lần đầu , khách đặt phòng bị sơ xuất từ phía booking vậy mà không hỗ trợ khách vấn đề nhỏ là gồm ăn sáng - mình phải thanh toán bù tiền lên mới gồm buffee sáng . Vấn đề cực kì nhỏ đối với 1 khách sạn lớn như thế , dịch vụ thật sự không thể tốt bằng SilkPath , chất lượng dịch vụ của khách sạn lớn như vậy lại có thể xử lý tình huống kém như thế ! Khách sạn nên xem xét lại !

review.rating: French provincial grandeur in the mountains of North Vietnam!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The hotel aesthetic is absolutely divine. So many beautiful vinyets in every corner in every room.  The scale of its magnificence is just so unbelievable.  I just marvelled how much work and money went into building and establishing the hotel in such a remote and isolated setting in rural mountainous Vietnam. 
The staff where very pleasant and obliging. Breakfast was a buffet and had many options to please.
review.comment_negative:
I personally found the bed hard and the pillows too soft. 
I had requested in my email city views only to be given mountain views . It turned out ok but I find it disconcerting to be told that I had requested mountain views when first arriving but until I read my email again did not want to argue the point at the front desk and decided not to challenge anyone about this when I did re:read the email that stated city views. 
Our alarm in our room went off at midnight first night and we have no idea why?

review.rating: Right in center of the town in a special design hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The hotel has quite special interior design, very artistic and good ambiance. Staffs are well trained, professional and kindness. The location is super to be in the right heart of Sapa town, the services to the cable cap to Fanxipan is very worth to buy. Swimming pool is cool experience.
review.comment_negative: There is no view from my room (maybe because just a standard room). The furniture in the room are way too big for the site of the room, feel cramped, therefore no luxury feeling like when you are at the lobby.

review.rating: You must spend a night there!
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: This is by far the best hotel I have ever been or seen in my entire life, and I have been to lots of fancy hotels / houses / castles / museums all over the world. I am still in awe about it a week after being there, and all I want to do is save enough money to stay there an entire month! My favorite place was the indoor pool, with the perfect salted water temp, and everything just so beautiful. Totally art deco, which is also my favorite architectural period, I was in heaven there.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, except that once again, like everywhere else, they sell you cheap European wine for an expensive price while they have one of the best  local white wine from Dalat, or the best rice / plum wine from the area, but they don't sell it to you. I would have paid European wine price to just get one of their awesome bottles of plum or Dalat wine!
